Stephanie Meyer - Twilight Saga (Book 1 of 3) - Twilight (54 Files)

Twilight is a vampire novel written by author Stephenie Meyer, originally published in hardcover in 2005. It is the genesis of the Twilight series, and introduces seventeen-year-old Isabella "Bella" Swan who moves from Phoenix, Arizona to Forks, Washington and finds her life in danger when she falls in love with a vampire, Edward Cullen.


Stephanie Meyer - Twilight Saga (Book 2 of 3) - New Moon (24 Files)

New Moon is a young adult romance novel by author Stephenie Meyer. This book, unlike the previous book in the series, is about losing true love. It is Meyer&#039;s second novel in the Twilight series. It was originally published in hardcover in 2006.


Stephanie Meyer - Twilight Saga (Book 3 of 3) - Eclipse (14 Files)

Eclipse is the third book in the Twilight Series by Stephenie Meyer. It continues the story of 18-year-old Bella Swan and her vampire love, Edward Cullen. Eclipse is the sequel to New Moon.
